metadata.title: CVE-2021-3753 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: [Unknown description] It was discovered that the virtual terminal (vt) device implementation in the Linux kernel contained a race condition in its ioctl handling that led to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. A local attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information.
